title: Trying to access google play but its signed in as someone else. How do I switch user-its not an opti
content: I'm borrowing a Samsung A8. I have signed into my google account, but when I try to access google play, it only gives me the option to sign in as my mate who owns the phone-it doesn't give me an option to sign in with a different user/account. I don't want to delete his account though I will give the phone back
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
